name: Salentica
description:
Salentica is a vertically integrated software firm, driven to provide the best client management solutions for our wealth management clients to enable them to drive operational efficiencies, reduce operational risk and improve business development processes to help grow their business. Our success is earned through our client’s success.
We achieve our business focus by; delivering software solutions that meet our wealth management client needs, providing innovative ideas and best practices based on our deep domain knowledge to help our clients be successful, and then providing the ongoing support services to ensure long term success and broad user adoption.
Salentica has provided Client Relationship Management solutions for wealth management firms since its inception in 1997. We bring a wealth of functionality and deep domain knowledge on the best practices, based on many years of experience working with wealth managers.
Our goal is to eliminate surprises for our key stakeholders including employees and clients, exceed the expectations of our clients and build long term relationships with our clients. Respecting and protecting our client’s confidential information is in our DNA and that will not be jeopardized.
